name: Xylo (Wejdani)
description:
Created by: Wejdan Al-Ahmadi

Modifications: 

  1. Re-skinned the game and changed it to fit a horror theme. 
  2. Modified prefabs (life pickup, checkpoint) with new 3D models to fit the aesthetic. 
  3. Modified the textures and materials to fit a horror game. 
  4. Added visual effects (particle effects, fog, smoke, dark theme skybox and created water shader). 
  5. Added audio cues (some audio clips were self recorded). 
  6. Added a cutscene with music and voiceover. 
  7. Added a minimap. 
  8. Changed the sound effects and the music. 
  9. Added difficulty scaling the lower the bosses health the more spawners appear. 
  10. Modified and changed UI icons and menu. 

Assets used were from MSU, Unity asset store. 

Extra 3D models from Sketchfab. 

Music and soundFX from epidemic sound.
